_comment_type: Question Type: Flowchart Completion Selecting Words From Text
_comment_description: Students complete a flowchart by selecting appropriate words/phrases from the reading passage.
_comment_use_case: Reading Passage 1/2/3, process descriptions, procedures, sequences
prompt: Complete the flowchart below. Choose NO MORE THAN TWO WORDS from the passage for each answer.

_field_descriptions.prompt: Instructions emphasizing words must come from the passage
_field_descriptions.answer_key: Array of words/phrases from passage for flowchart boxes
_field_descriptions.image_url: URL to flowchart image with numbered blank boxes

_validation_rules.passage_verification: All answers must exist in the reading passage

_grading.accepts_variations: Singular/plural forms if both in passage
